mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , DEFRAY_ACNUT_NO AS defrayAcnutNo /* */ , VIRTL_ACNUT_NO AS virtlAcnutNo /* */ , REVW_SMBOL AS revwSmbol /* */ , DELNG_AMOUNT AS delngAmount /* */ , BLCE_SMBOL AS blceSmbol /* */ , BLCE AS blce /* */ , BANK_CODE AS bankCode /* */ , ACNUT_NO AS acnutNo /* */ , IR_SAF_SE AS irSafSe /* */ , SALARY_TRANSFR_SE AS salaryTransfrSe /* */ , FEE AS fee /* */ , CMS_CODE AS cmsCode /* */ , DEFRAY_ACNUT_PRNTXT AS defrayAcnutPrntxt /* */ , RCPMNY_ACNUT_PRNTXT AS rcpmnyAcnutPrntxt /* */ , CINET_DELNG_INNB AS cinetDelngInnb /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T0200200 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
